attributes.additional_details: This Petition was formed in order to protect UK and International citizens from Covert Terrorism and Mind Control Experimentations currently in place in the World! Thousand's of Targeted Individuals globally are claiming they are being Tracked, Stalked Tortured and Harassed by the illegal useage of Satellites, Cell Towers and Perpetratorss with Electronic Energy Weapons (what is now listed by the military as "Electronic Weapons" or "Less than Leathel weapons" including 'High-Powered Microwave Energy Weapons). So far there are well over 10,000 victims who claim they have been randomly selected and possibly illegally implanted with RFID Microchips for illegal and non-consensual experimentations. They believe it is done by Secret Government Intelligence Services. We want this to STOP NOW!
